summary: A collection of PyTorch/DGL examples that implement Relational Graph Convolutional Networks (RGCN) for node (entity) classification and link prediction on heterogeneous knowledge‑graph benchmarks. It includes model definition, data loading utilities, training scripts for full‑graph, mini‑batch, and multi‑GPU settings, and evaluation of classification accuracy and ranking metrics.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation and reproducible benchmark for relational graph neural networks, enabling researchers and developers to experiment with RGCN models on standard RDF datasets and to assess performance on entity classification and link prediction tasks.
